title: Guys, Ahri doesn't have a Christmas/ Snow themed skin yet
body: And let's not forget Pool Party, and Blood Moon, and Elementalist, and Elderwood. The possibilities are endless!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body: I'm tired of theses Ahri skins
I am not! Keep them coming Riot please!
Hum this is probably the reason she didnt get a faker/skt skin 0.O
Her new skin looks fantastic, and I will probably buy it. But I also main other champions {{champion:69}} {{champion:164}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:112}}

https://i.imgflip.com/1tuycb.jpg
*Viktor and Illaoi Not found*

Nice Mains, man.
I am also Ornn One Trick Pony.

> [{quoted}](name=FireThornzZ,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=1ewFdVIZ,comment-id=00020002,timestamp=2017-08-10T06:26:57.377+0000)
>
> https://i.imgflip.com/1tuycb.jpg
> *Viktor and Illaoi Not found*
> 
> Nice Mains, man.
> I am also Ornn One Trick Pony.

You actually assume I play on this account? Dont be so obvious {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} Pretty sure I dont own Vik or Illaoi on this
Why post on an account you don't play on? Either your main is banned or you're ashamed of something?

{{champion:164}} will probably get a PROJECT skin in the next PROJECT event.
{{champion:112}} will probably get a Program skin, some day.
{{champion:420}} fits perfectly into the Pool Party theme.
{{champion:69}} There was a really nice Dragon Queen Cass concept which Riot should realise.

_**Almighty. **_

Camille got a "program" skin instead, which is the counterpart to the PROJECT skins,

Viktor is probably a good candidate for a program skin, good call there...

Illaoi probably won't get a pool party skin for a while, because they're reluctant to make those unless they can make it really distinctive.

Dragon queen Cass overlaps a lot with her jade fang skin, very similar aesthetically speaking.

I'm sure Riot can make Dragon Cass look and feel different from Jade Fang.

For once, she can have fire particles.
She can have a voice filter.
Or, why not go all the way and make her a new voice over? A dragon spitting fire while talking about poison doesn't fit well.

_**Almighty.**_
***Alrighty*** then.
It hasn't even been a year for Camille yet, though.

To be fair champions don't HAVE to wait a year before getting a new skin.
Ekko didn't, and neither did Orianna. 

It's just that if they wait a shorter time they tend to get less quality skins.
You're right, but you shouldn't be expecting a skin for a champion before they're a year old.

>Ahri Christmas skin.

I'd unwrap that. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
A character in the game.... wow get a life ahahhahaha

>A character in the game.... wow get a life ahahhahaha

You don't ship much, do you.
Also, did it occur to you that I may have meant "I would buy that skin"?

But go right ahead - ["love" your Quinn](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/PizTEHPg-the-most-favorite-champion-of-all-time-voting-elimination-group-a?comment=00020001). It's just a game character. ;)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NNC0kIzM1Fo&feature=youtu.be&t=7
he loves Quinn and is bashing some one for liking ahri... odd

Such is the EUNE logic, I've learned.
Makes me ashamed of being on this server myself.
https://www.mememaker.net/static/images/memes/4458639.jpg

https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5488/14201592971_994e138000_b.jpg

######_Clip from "[Helen of Troy](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0340477/)", for those who wonder._ ^^
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/887/589/090.jpg
What about Project, Underworld and High Noon?
At this point, I wouldn't be surprised if Ahri gets a christmas skin this december as well.
Imo, change are great she will get poolparty next year
If they bother to make any. Since you know this year so far we didn't get any :(

because arhi was arleady getting star guardian, even them can understand both back to back would have been too much.
But Arhi will get pp skin next year for sure

And don't forget skins from other regions. Bilgewater Pirate Ahri, Shuriman Explorer Ahri, Noxian Ahri, Zaun Mad Scientist Ahri... Soon, LoL will consist entirely of 137 variations of Ahri and nothing else. 
And I'm ok with that {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

>50 Shades of Ahri

FTFY ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Years from now, people will ask if Ahri was the main character of League.
It's obvious she'll get a Mecha skin on 7.19, so she can the snowish theme by december.

Christmas theme has been overused, brace yourselves for.... HanukkAhri.

Phreak would be proud.

All jokes apart I do find it ridiculous she is getting so many skins. I understand that she's quite the adaptable character and can fit many themes but come on.

>I understand that she's quite the adaptable character and can fit many themes but come on.

Every champion fits every theme.

It's a matter of doing it.

There are so many good possibilities for Yorick, some of the most in the game. Such as, a shining paladin who summons little knight minions to do his bidding. Or a crazed cat lady Yorick with his army of kitties. I can go on and on but there's just so much you can do with Yorick and his minions. Possibilities are endless.

I mean, a lot of Ahri's skins are just her in cute outfits. And they sell.

>Such as, a shining paladin who summons little knight minions to do his bidding. 

Now I just want an Overlord Yorick skin.

http://static.tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pub/images/Overlord.jpg

---

Honestly, for a long time I wish Rito made a "Up to eleven" Syndra skin.
Like those skins HotS has.
Diablo and Hell Iron Diablo, Kerrigan and Primal Queen Kerrigan, Tracer and Turbo Tracer, etc.

Longer skirt-thingies, some kind of an armor or armor-like clothing, more elaborate headdress, abilities with an extra oomph and a voiceover to match the "upgrade". Could be even legendary.
This would be an exception to the rule I made ~2 years ago about not spending a single penny more on LoL.

But it seems there's some unwritten rule preventing them from creating a Syndra skin with new/updated voiceover. _<shrug>_

I was hoping she'd get a Heart Seeker skin cause honestly that would just make the most sense but now she has two pink skins.

I am however glad she's getting a Star Guardian skin, and a Legendary skin, at the same time :D. Oh and Syndra's too.
OH YOU DIDN'T GET IT BOI
Apparently you're right I didn't get it :).
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/038/337/gif.gif
Ahri makes money! People buy Ahri skins! Riot knows this, and abuses it... We now have legendary Ahri coming up and i am super excited!

>Riot knows this, and abuses it...

[So...they must now ban themselves for 14 days?](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/7ZUOPyhx-this-group-won-without-a-single-kill-and-riot-bans-them-all-for-14-days)

No. No more Ahri skins. For the love of god she has among the most skins with particles and she's getting a legendary right now.

...although, I hate to say it, I bet she'll get all the skins you listed before Shen gets another.

>I bet she'll get all the skins you listed before **Shen** gets another.

http://orig04.deviantart.net/c178/f/2015/197/9/9/_lol__are_you_lonely__yorick__by_rookie141-d91k4l0.jpg

http://leaguememe.com/uploads/league/1857280991.jpg
lets not forget her harrowing skin DUH!!!!
haha a black cat skin for halloween!! yay!
It's too soon. Last year she got an epic skin, this year a legendary. We'll have to wait until 2018 for her Ultimate skin.

I believe Blood Moon Ahri already exists under the name "Challenger Ahri".

Next time on the Pee Bee Eee...
Battlecast Ahri.
Rusty Ahri.
Omega squad Ahri.
Ahri Ahri.


{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

_**Almighty.**_

Coming soon, Traditional Ahri!

Marvel at the original Ahri design, long buried beneath piles of the skins you've bought for her, now uncovered again!  Only 975 RP to go back to those halcyon ~~googling~~ 2011 days!
Fuck it lets just give her PROJECT, Program, Super Galaxy, and Heart Seeker while were at it. Hand money to Rito for Ahri $kins
